comment: @AgentADRex @sportslogosnet @BlueJays @UniWatch Same idea, but a bit more common. Both are printed in anticipation of an outcome, but the phantom tickets are more widely distributed because tickets may be sent out to SSH in preparation for the games. The phantom merch only hits the marketplace by mistake (I believe)
